name: Only one mission by H.P. Andersen
name_original: Only one mission by H.P. Andersen
description:
GMTK Jam Summer 2019 Submission
Theme: Only one

Only one mission:
A game about gathering resources and upgrading your equipment to handle the mission (Get to the bottom of the crater and see what is there)

TIPS:
DON'T WASTE FUEL. Using the rocket to go up and down is expensive, so be careful!

There is fall damage! 
When going down be careful and preserve your fuel! 

WASD Controls, 

Space - Boost upwards

Left Ctrl - Boost downwards

Left Mouse click - Hit objects

F - Interact (Open crafting while on a crafter)

Tab - Toggle Resource view
